tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensor_data ( 
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    device_id UUID NOT NULL, 
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    sensor_value DECIMAL NOT NULL, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE sensors (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    sensor_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE sensors (sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location STRING, sensor_type STRING, value FLOAT, timestamp TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE devices (device_id INT PRIMARY KEY, device_name STRING, device_type STRING, location STRING, installation_date DATE, status STRING)
CREATE TABLE readings (reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sensor_id INT, value FLOAT, timestamp TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE sensors (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    sensor_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE analytics (
    analytics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    min_value FLOAT,
    max_value FLOAT
);
